about_the_game:
"In a world where shadows hide the most dangerous threats, one agent steps into the darkness."

As Agent Adrian Thompson, a former Navy SEAL recruited by the covert agency E.L.I.T.E., you navigate a world spiraling into chaos. E.L.I.T.E. operates in absolute secrecy, dismantling powerful criminal organizations and preventing global terror with no government oversight.

E.L.I.T.E. has always been a force of stability, quietly preserving a delicate balance between order and chaos without ever revealing its existence. However, as you embark on a new high-stakes operation, you begin to sense that things aren’t as stable as they seem. But when corruption begins to fester and the world plunges into chaos, you have a small window to act. Will you fight?

Here’s what you can expect from the game’s features, weapons, equipment, and various game modes:

Game Modes (Online Mode):

  • Hostage Rescue – Either rescue hostages or prevent the opposing team from securing them.

  • Team Deathmatch – Engage in classic team-based combat with the objective to eliminate the opposing team.

  • Bodyguard – Protect a key individual as one team or attempt to take them down as the other.

  • Ranked Team Deathmatch – Competitive team combat where ranking up is key, with matchmaking based on skill level.

Features (Online Mode):

  • Realism – The Last E.L.I.T.E.s focuses on realistic gameplay mechanics and visuals.

  • Minimal User Interface – A limited or toggleable interface to keep the experience immersive.

  • Proximity Voice Chat (Vivox) – Communicate with allies and rivals within hearing range for added strategic depth.

  • Seasonal Events – Participate in special events like Halloween or Christmas with unique challenges and bonuses.

Weapons (Online Mode):

  • M4A1 – Versatile and reliable, the go-to weapon for many players.

  • E.L.I.T.E.-Issued Pistols 1 & 2 – Agency-crafted sidearms with enhanced performance.

  • AK Variant – Powerful and effective, a classic for any intense encounter.

And more firearms to unlock and experiment with as you play.

Equipment (Online Mode):

  • Fragmentation Grenade – Standard explosive to clear rooms or block advances.

  • Flash Grenade – Disorients opponents, giving you a tactical advantage.

  • Radio Jammer – Temporarily cuts off enemy communication within a radius.

  • E.L.I.T.E. Tac Tablet – Provides intel on teammate locations, keeping everyone in sync.

  • EM Wall Sensor – Detects movement through one wall, useful for ambushes.

Abilities (Online Mode):

E.L.I.T.E. Surveillance Drone – A UAV provides multispectral and thermal imaging, allowing you to locate targets from a distance.

Run – Increases speed and negates flashbang effects, simulating an adrenaline boost.

Airstrike – Call in a UAV to launch low-yield missiles at a marked position.

Ghost Life – A specialized defibrillator revives you 10 seconds after being downed, offering a second chance in intense situations. (Can only be used once!)

All online weapons are unlocked through in-game credits earned by playing, keeping progression fair. The game offers only direct purchase options, meaning all in-game progression is achieved through gameplay, not purchases.

Story Mode Differences: In story mode, weapons and equipment are carefully curated to match your character’s journey, adding another layer of immersion. Abilities aren’t part of the story mode; instead, equipment is tied to the storyline, adapting to the mission's needs.

Write your story!

Every choice you make shapes the story, impacting both immediate outcomes and long-term consequences. As you navigate complex missions and make critical decisions, you’ll experience multiple story paths, each with unique outcomes that affect the world and the characters around you.

Online Mode

In The Last E.L.I.T.E.s online mode, players can join forces or compete against others in a thrilling, high-stakes environment. Engage in co-op missions with friends, where teamwork and strategy are key to overcoming challenging objectives, or test your skills in competitive modes that pit your tactical abilities against other agents worldwide.

Ranked Online Mode brings another level of intensity and strategy for players seeking a true test of their skills. Climb the ranks as you face off against other agents in high-stakes missions. As you advance, you'll encounter tougher opponents and gain access to exclusive rewards and achievements that showcase your progression. With each season, leaderboards are reset, giving players the chance to earn a spot among the top agents, secure rare customizations, and leave their mark on the world of E.L.I.T.E.

Justice and Revenge

Justice seeks to restore balance, guided by principles and fairness, while revenge is fueled by personal vendetta, aiming to inflict the same pain endured. One builds a future, the other, a cycle. Both are powerful forces, but only one can truly heal.

When you get the choice. What will you choose?

Are you ready for the challenge? Don't forget to join our discord!

Infinity Productions AB

Infinity Productions is a dedicated, passionate game development studio established by a group of Swedish teenage developers focused on pushing the boundaries of storytelling and gameplay.

Based on a shared vision to create impactful, high-quality games, we thrive on innovation, creativity, and collaboration. We believe in delivering experiences that resonate with players worldwide. Our job is to create a game worth playing. Something that gamers, just like us, want to play. Something that will be remembered.

content_descriptors.notes:
For The Last E.L.I.T.E.s, we want players to know that our game includes mature content intended for a mature audience. The game contains frequent depictions of intense action and violence, including combat situations with firearms, explosives, and close-quarters combat. Violence is central to the gameplay and is depicted realistically within the narrative context of an elite agent facing dangerous opponents.

While there are no depictions of sexual acts, themes of corruption and betrayal, as well as scenes depicting crime, terrorism, and political intrigue, are core elements of the storyline. The game may also include references to alcohol use and mild language.

We aim to approach these themes with respect to the narrative and to provide a challenging yet thoughtful experience. If any of these elements may be sensitive for you, please take them into consideration before playing.

name: The Last E.L.I.T.E.s

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-7700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 42 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i9-11900
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 4070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 64 GB available space

steam_germany.descriptors:
Sexualisierte Gewalt / Sexual violence
Drastische Gewalt
Drogen

short_description: You embark on an epic journey as the elite agent Adrian Thompson working for the extra-governmental intelligence agency E.L.I.T.E. As you investigate a series of corrupt politicians you discover troubling news. Your investigation comes to an abrupt end when E.L.I.T.E. falls.
